name: Outro
_source: music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, Princess Eirika.|The castle has been secured.|And...
speak;Seth;...This way.|This is the room Orson was holed up in.
speak;Ephraim;This same magic was used to control Emperor Vigarde.|She's already dead, and her corpse was used to...
speak;Ephraim;You needn't look any longer, Eirika.|Let's go outside.
speak;Seth;...You can't say this thing is truly alive anymore.|I'll...
speak;Ephraim;No...|I'll do it.|...The two of them spent every day in here, did they?|Orson was mad.|But I think he was happy...
speak;Eirika;Mmm...|We can repair the castle, and what was stolen, we can do without.|But the wounds and suffering inflicted upon the people of Renais...

speak;Ephraim;It's too late to undo their pain.|Once I become king, I must set our country right.|I doubt the people will give me a warm reception, though.|I did abandon them.|All I can do is try to win back their trust, no matter how long it takes...
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, Prince Ephraim.|You should look outside.
speak;Crowd;Prince Ephraim!|Princess Eirika!|The king has returned!|Our king!|Glory to Renais!|Long live King Ephraim!

speak;Seth;...They're not cheering for you.|They cheer because Orson's misrule is at an end.|They cheer the possibility of a better tomorrow, not the deeds we did today.|But how will the hearts of the people move tomorrow and the next day?|That is for you to decide.
speak;Ephraim;I will not let their hopes and dreams be shattered again.|I will be king.|Like my father before me, I will dedicate myself to their happiness.
speak;Eirika;And I will do all I can to help, Ephraim.

speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, Princess Eirika.|Before Renais fell, King Fado entrusted me with this message:|"Raise the twin bracelets in the hall of kings.|The seal will be broken.|The resting place of the Sacred Stone will be revealed"...
speak;Eirika;So we're supposed to raise our bracelets over our heads, right?
speak;Ephraim;This is the Stone of Renais...
speak;Eirika;Yes.|This is one of the five stones that defeated the Demon King.
speak;Ephraim;If Lyon had acquired our bracelets, the stone would have been destroyed by now.|Together, we protected the only power that can help us stop Lyon's insanity.
speak;Eirika;Yes.|It's the only hope left to us.|Hope for you and me, and the last true hope for peace...
speak;Ephraim;What is this?|Are they reacting to the light of the stone?
speak;Eirika;I can't believe the bracelets contain so much power...

speak;Ephraim;I wonder if Father anticipated all of this long ago.|When I was growing up, I never thought about becoming king.|I only wanted to be a good soldier, a good warrior.|The best on the battlefield.|Father never understood what I wanted, but...|I never understood him, either.
speak;Ephraim;It was the same when Grado invaded Renais.|I should have stayed home to defend the kingdom...|Instead, I raced off to fight for personal glory.
speak;Eirika;Brother...|I don't think you know how well Father understood your feelings.|When I last saw him, he was concerned for nothing but our safety...
speak;Seth;Eirika is correct.|King Fado asked after your exploits every day.|He always told me what a fine king you would one day make.
speak;Seth;Now Prince Ephraim, Princess Eirika.|Please wait for me for a moment.|The Sacred Twins of Renais should be near the stone's reliquary.|I'll grab them real quick.
speak;Seth;Ah, here we go.|This lance can only be one of the Sacred Twins of Renais.|Please, Prince Ephraim, take this sacred relic and feel its weight.
speak;Ephraim;So this is one of our Sacred Twin relics, is it?|I've never seen them.|Look, there's a name inscribed here.|Siegmund, the Flame Lance.
speak;Seth;And this blade is sister to the lance, the other Sacred Twin of legend.|Princess Eirika, if you would?
speak;Eirika;Of course.|There's a name carved here as well.|Sieglinde, the Thunder Blade...

speak;Eirika;These are the ancient weapons of our ancestors-the weapons of heroes.|They were enshrined generations ago, to be used only by the king...|and only in times of dire need.|Such an awful power they possess, and yet we need them to restore peace.|I've seen enough of the horrors of war, but I can't turn my back on it.|If we merely turn our eyes away, we surrender our world to atrocity.|And so, I must fight.|I'll do whatever I must do to bring back the peace we once knew.
speak;Larachel;What is happening?|Have you found the Sacred Stone?
speak;Larachel;Wow!|It truly is spectacular.|This goes some way to brighten the dark shadows that loom over us.
speak;Innes;Our country's Sacred Stones have been shattered by Grado's men.|The Stone of Renais is our last remaining weapon.

speak;Larachel;No, it's not.|You have forgotten the stone of my beloved Rausten.|Remember, there were five Sacred Stones for our five nations.|The Stones of Grado, Frelia, and Jehanna are gone, but hope is not.|We have the Stone of Renais, after all, and that of Rausten is safe.|Our road is clear, my friends.|I must guide you to Rausten.
speak;Eirika;You're right.|L'Arachel, we're counting on you to lead the way.
speak;Larachel;Of course.|And you will all be welcome to stay in the palace.|And, Eirika, you shall be my guest in my own private quarters!|Let us be on our way.
